titleStmt.title: Housewives League is Organized
titleStmt.author: Name of author of document goes here

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

objectDesc.p:
Dr. Eartha M.M White, a di
a director of the Business League,
launched a drive to compile a di
rectory of local business and pro
fessional people and to form a
Housewives League, at a meet
ing held at Clara White Mission
Auditorium.

Dr.White is founder-president
of Clara White Mission Inc. 613
W. Ashley St.

Persons who attended the ini
tial meeting assisted in recording
information as to "Who is Who"
in Jacksonville in more than 50
diversified types of business and
professional services here.

Mrs. Lenora Davis of the
Davis Employment Agency was
named to head the Jacksonville
Housewives League. Also on the
staff are Mrs. C. M. Young and
Mrs. Izola Fleming of the Taxi
Drivers Ladies Auxiliary, and
Mrs. Ethel Powell, Home Dem
ostration Agent for Duval
County

Miss White plans to report her
findings in the survey to the Na
tional Business League in its an
nual convention at Durham, N.C.
July 30.

The group will meet at the mis
sion Thursday at 7 p.m. to com
plete the organization of the
Housewives League. All house
wives and business and profes
sional persons may attend.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.
